name: Defective Robot (zhangtianhou)
description:
[Description]

You fall into a dangerous place and your only robot breaks down But the robot will give you a random item every once in a while and make good use of it

[Controls]
  • The key "WSAD" controls characters' up, down, left, and right
  • "Q" key to switch weapons
  • "E" key to enter the upgrade panel
  • Left mouse button to fire bullets
  • Right mouse button to change magazines
[Support provided by the robot]
  • "Ammo Support" --- Provides the player with ammo
  • "Healing Support" --- restores the player's health
  • "Physical Boost" --- Increase the player's stamina recovery speed [melee attack will consume stamina]
  • "Shield Support" --- protects the player from enemy damage and knocks them back
  • "Absorptive Support" --- Extend the player's full-screen absorption time [Absorb the parts dropped by the enemy to upgrade the robot]
  • "Laser Support" --- the robot will shoot lasers at enemies around the player
